game-description.fortuneteller:
This game is made of Vanilla JavaScript and CSS Animations.
Repository Link : https://github.com/Sylvie-C/fortuneteller.
Want to download this game on your computer ? - Follow Github repository link above, - Click on 'Code' green button, - Download Zip file, - Unzip downloaded file on your computer, Open 'index.html' file in your browser.
game-description.minesweeper:
This game is developped with ReactJS.
Repository link : https://github.com/Sylvie-C/minesweeper.
